item.title: Series of potholes next to Gromit, 22nd April
item.description:
At the top of Chargrove Lane, next to the Gromit, there is a series of potholes. These are causing cars to swerve onto the opposite side of the road to avoid them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water leaking onto pavement, 21st April
item.description:
Water running down the slope to the underpass near KFC. It is bubbling up from between paving slabs on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
